Package org.traincontrol.base

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RemoteDevice<DEVICE,MESSAGE>
    This interface defines a remote device, such as a locomotive or switch
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Accessory
    Abstract switch/signal class
    Feedback
    Abstract feedback/sensor class
    Locomotive
    Abstract locomotive class Defines all key user-accessible functionality
    RemoteDeviceCollection<ITEM,IDENTIFIER>
    A generic collection of items with unique string names
    Route
    Abstract route class
    RouteCommand
    Individual route command
